original: ghuṣyate yasya nagare raṅgayātrā dine dine /
analyzed: ghuṣyate yasya nagare raṅga yātrā dine dine

original: tam ahaṃ śirasā vande rājānaṃ kulaśekharam //
analyzed: tam aham śirasā vande rājānam kulaśekharam

original: śrīvallabheti varadeti dayāpareti bhaktapriyeti bhavaluṇṭhanakovideti /
analyzed: śrī vallabhā iti vara dā iti dayā parā iti bhakta priyā iti bhava luṇṭhana kovidā iti

original: nātheti nāgaśayaneti jagannivāsety ālāpinaṃ pratidinaṃ kuru māṃ mukunda // KMukm_1 //
analyzed: nātha iti nāgaśayana iti jagannivāsa iti ālāpinam pratidinam kuru mām mukunda

original: jayatu jayatu devo devakīnandano 'yaṃ jayatu jayatu kṛṣṇo vṛṣṇivaṃśapradīpaḥ /
analyzed: jayatu jayatu devaḥ devakīnandanaḥ yam jayatu jayatu kṛṣṇaḥ vṛṣṇi vaṃśa pradīpaḥ

original: jayatu jayatu meghaśyāmalaḥ komalāṅgo jayatu jayatu pṛthvībhāranāśo mukundaḥ // KMukm_2 //
analyzed: jayatu jayatu megha śyāmalaḥ komala aṅgaḥ jayatu jayatu pṛthvī bhāra nāśaḥ mukundaḥ

original: mukunda mūrdhnā praṇipatya yāce bhavantam ekāntam iyantam artham /
analyzed: mukunda mūrdhnā praṇipatya yāce bhavantam ekāntam iyantam artham

original: avismṛtis tvaccaraṇāravinde bhave bhave me 'stu bhavatprasādāt // KMukm_3 //
analyzed: a vismṛtiḥ tvad caraṇa aravinde bhave bhave me stu bhavat prasādāt

original: nāhaṃ vande tava caraṇayor dvandvam advandvahetoḥ kumbhīpākaṃ gurum api hare nārakaṃ nāpanetum /
analyzed: na aham vande tava caraṇayoḥ dvandvam a dvandva hetoḥ kumbhīpākam gurum api hare nārakam nā apanetum

original: ramyā rāmā mṛdutanulatā nandane nāpi rantuṃ bhāve bhāve hṛdayabhavane bhāvayeyaṃ bhavantam // KMukm_4 //
analyzed: ramyāḥ rāmāḥ mṛdu tanu latāḥ nandane nā api rantum bhāve bhāve hṛdaya bhavane bhāvayeyam bhavantam

original: nāsthā dharme na vasunicaye naiva kāmopabhoge yad bhāvyaṃ tad bhavatu bhagavan pūrvakarmānurūpam /
analyzed: nā āsthā dharme na vasu nicaye nā eva kāma upabhoge yat bhāvyam tat bhavatu bhagavan pūrva karma anurūpam

original: etat prārthyaṃ mama bahu-mataṃ janmajanmāntare 'pi tvatpādāmbhoruhayugagatā niścalā bhaktir astu // KMukm_5 //
analyzed: etat prārthyam mama bahu matam janma janmāntare tvad pāda ambhoruha yuga gatā niścalā bhaktiḥ astu

original: divi vā bhuvi vā mamāstu vāso narake vā narakāntaka prakāmam /
analyzed: divi vā bhuvi vā mama astu vāsaḥ narake vā naraka antaka prakāmam

original: avadhīritaśāradāravindau caraṇau te maraṇe 'pi cintayāmi // KMukm_6 //
analyzed: avadhīrita śārada aravindau caraṇau te maraṇe cintayāmi

original: kṛṣṇa tvadīyapadapaṅkajapañjarāntar adyaiva me viśatu mānasarājahaṃsaḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa tvadīya pada paṅkaja pañjara antar adyā eva me viśatu mānasa rājahaṃsaḥ

original: prāṇaprayāṇasamaye kaphavātapittaiḥ kaṇṭhāvarodhanavidhau smaraṇaṃ kutas te // KMukm_7 //
analyzed: prāṇa prayāṇa samaye kapha vāta pittaiḥ kaṇṭha avarodhana vidhau smaraṇam kutas te

original: cintayāmi harim eva santataṃ mandamandahāsitānanāmbujam /
analyzed: cintayāmi harim eva santatam manda manda hāsita ānana ambujam

original: nandagopatanayaṃ parāt paraṃ nāradādimunivṛndavanditam // KMukm_8 //
analyzed: nanda gopa tanayam parāt param nārada ādi muni vṛnda vanditam

original: karacaraṇasaroje kāntimannetramīne śramamuṣi bhujavīcivyākule 'gādhamārge /
analyzed: kara caraṇa saroje kāntimat netra mīne śrama muṣi bhuja vīci vyākule gādha mārge

original: harisarasi vigāhyāpīya tejojalaughaṃ bhavamaruparikhinnaḥ khedam adya tyajāmi // KMukm_9 //
analyzed: hari sarasi vigāhya āpīya tejaḥ jala ogham bhava maru parikhinnaḥ khedam adya tyajāmi

original: sarasijanayane saśaṅkhacakre murabhidi mā viramasva citta rantum /
analyzed: sarasija nayane sa śaṅkha cakre murabhidi mā viramasva citta rantum

original: sukhataram aparaṃ na jātu jāne haricaraṇasmaraṇāmṛtena tulyam // KMukm_10 //
analyzed: sukhataram aparam na jātu jāne hari caraṇa smaraṇa amṛtena tulyam

original: mābhīr mandamano vicintya bahudhā yāmīś ciraṃ yātanā nāmī naḥ prabhavanti pāparipavaḥ svāmī nanu śrīdharaḥ /
analyzed: mā abhīḥ manda manaḥ vicintya bahudhā yāmīḥ ciram yātanāḥ na amī naḥ prabhavanti pāpa ripavaḥ svāmī nanu śrīdharaḥ

original: ālasyaṃ vyapanīya bhaktisulabhaṃ dhyāyasva nārāyaṇaṃ lokasya vyasanāpanodanakaro dāsasya kiṃ na kṣamaḥ // KMukm_11 //
analyzed: ālasyam vyapanīya bhakti sulabham dhyāyasva nārāyaṇam lokasya vyasana apanodana karaḥ dāsasya kim na kṣamaḥ

original: bhavajaladhigatānāṃ dvandvavātāhatānāṃ sutaduhitṛkalatratrāṇabhārārditānām /
analyzed: bhava jaladhi gatānām dvandva vāta āhatānām suta duhitṛ kalatra trāṇa bhāra arditānām

original: viṣamaviṣayatoye majjatām aplavānāṃ bhavatu śaraṇam eko viṣṇupoto narāṇām // KMukm_12 //
analyzed: viṣama viṣaya toye majjatām aplavānām bhavatu śaraṇam ekaḥ viṣṇu potaḥ narāṇām

original: bhavajaladhim agādhaṃ dustaraṃ nistareyaṃ katham aham iti ceto mā sma gāḥ kātaratvam /
analyzed: bhava jaladhim agādham dustaram nistareyam katham aham iti cetaḥ mā sma gāḥ kātara tvam

original: sarasijadṛśi deve tāvakī bhaktir ekā narakabhidi niṣaṇṇā tārayiṣyaty avaśyam // KMukm_13 //
analyzed: sarasija dṛśi deve tāvakī bhaktiḥ ekā naraka bhidi niṣaṇṇā tārayiṣyati avaśyam

original: tṛṣṇātoye madanapavanoddhūtamohormimāle dārāvarte tanayasahajagrāhasaṅghākule ca /
analyzed: tṛṣṇā toye madana pavana uddhūta moha ūrmi māle dāra āvarte tanaya sahaja grāha saṅgha ākule ca

original: saṃsārākhye mahati jaladhau majjatāṃ nas tridhāman pādāmbhoje varada bhavato bhaktināvaṃ prayaccha // KMukm_14 //
analyzed: saṃsāra ākhye mahati jaladhau majjatām naḥ tridhāman pāda ambhoje vara da bhavataḥ bhakti nāvam prayaccha

original: mā drākṣaṃ kṣīṇapuṇyān kṣaṇam api bhavato bhaktihīnān padābje mā śrauṣaṃ śrāvyabandhaṃ tava caritam apāsyānyad ākhyānajātam /
analyzed: mā drākṣam kṣīṇa puṇyān kṣaṇam api bhavataḥ bhakti hīnān pada abje mā śrauṣam śrāvya bandham tava caritam apāsya anyat ākhyāna jātam

original: mā smārṣaṃ mādhava tvām api bhuvanapate cetasāpahnuvānān mā bhūvaṃ tvatsaparyāvyatikararahito janmajanmāntare 'pi // KMukm_15 //
analyzed: mā smārṣam mādhava tvām api bhuvana pate cetasā apahnuvānān mā bhūvam tvad saparyā vyatikara rahitaḥ janma janmāntare pi

original: jihve kīrtaya keśavaṃ muraripuṃ ceto bhaja śrīdharaṃ pāṇidvandva samarcayācyutakathāḥ śrotradvaya tvaṃ śṛṇu /
analyzed: jihve kīrtaya keśavam muraripum cetaḥ bhaja śrīdharam pāṇi dvandva samarcaya acyuta kathāḥ śrotra dvaya tvam śṛṇu

original: kṛṣṇaṃ lokaya locanadvaya harer gacchāṅghriyugmālayaṃ jighra ghrāṇa mukundapādatulasīṃ mūrdhan namādhokṣajam // KMukm_16 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇam lokaya locana dvaya hareḥ gaccha aṅghri yugma ālayam jighra ghrāṇa mukunda pāda tulasīm mūrdhan nama adhokṣajam

original: he lokāḥ śṛṇuta prasūtimaraṇavyādheś cikitsām imāṃ yogajñāḥ samudāharanti munayo yāṃ yājñavalkyādayaḥ /
analyzed: he lokāḥ śṛṇuta prasūti maraṇa vyādheḥ cikitsām imām yoga jñāḥ samudāharanti munayaḥ yām yājñavalkya ādayaḥ

original: antarjyotir ameyam ekam amṛtaṃ kṛṣṇākhyam āpīyatāṃ tat pītaṃ paramauṣadhaṃ vitanute nirvāṇam ātyantikam // KMukm_17 //
analyzed: antar jyotiḥ ameyam ekam amṛtam kṛṣṇa ākhyam āpīyatām tat pītam parama auṣadham vitanute nirvāṇam ātyantikam

original: he martyāḥ paramaṃ hitaṃ śṛṇuta vo vakṣyāmi saṅkṣepataḥ saṃsārārṇavam āpadūrmibahulaṃ samyak praviśya sthitāḥ /
analyzed: he martyāḥ paramam hitam śṛṇuta vaḥ vakṣyāmi saṅkṣepataḥ saṃsāra arṇavam āpad ūrmi bahulam samyak praviśya sthitāḥ

original: nānājñānam apāsya cetasi namo nārāyaṇāyety amuṃ mantraṃ sapraṇavaṃ praṇāmasahitaṃ prāvartayadhvaṃ muhuḥ // KMukm_18 //
analyzed: nānā jñānam apāsya cetasi namaḥ nārāyaṇāya iti amum mantram sa praṇavam praṇāma sahitam prāvartayadhvam muhur

original: pṛthvī reṇur aṇuḥ payāṃsi kaṇikāḥ phalguḥ sphuliṅgo laghuḥ tejo niḥśvasanaṃ marut tanutaraṃ randhraṃ susūkṣmaṃ nabhaḥ /
analyzed: pṛthvī reṇuḥ aṇuḥ payāṃsi kaṇikāḥ phalguḥ sphuliṅgaḥ laghuḥ tejaḥ niḥśvasanam marut tanutaram randhram su sūkṣmam nabhaḥ

original: kṣudrā rudrapitāmahaprabhṛtayaḥ kīṭāḥ samastāḥ surāḥ dṛṣṭe yatra sa tāvako vijayate bhūmāvadhūtāvadhiḥ // KMukm_19 //
analyzed: kṣudrāḥ rudra pitāmaha prabhṛtayaḥ kīṭāḥ samastāḥ surāḥ dṛṣṭe yatra sa tāvakaḥ vijayate bhūma avadhūta avadhiḥ

original: baddhenāñjalinā natena śirasā gātraiḥ saromodgamaiḥ kaṇṭhena svaragadgadena nayanenodgīrṇabāṣpāmbunā /
analyzed: baddhena añjalinā natena śirasā gātraiḥ sa roma udgamaiḥ kaṇṭhena svara gadgadena nayanena udgīrṇa bāṣpa ambunā

original: nityaṃ tvaccaraṇāravindayugaladhyānāmṛtāsvādinām asmākaṃ sarasīruhākṣa satataṃ sampadyatāṃ jīvitam // KMukm_20 //
analyzed: nityam tvad caraṇa aravinda yugala dhyāna amṛta āsvādinām asmākam sarasīruha akṣa satatam sampadyatām jīvitam

original: he gopālaka he kṛpājalanidhe he sindhukanyāpate he kaṃsāntaka he gajendrakaruṇāpārīṇa he mādhava /
analyzed: he gopālaka he kṛpā jalanidhe he sindhu kanyā pate he kaṃsa antaka he gaja indra karuṇā pārīṇa he mādhava

original: he rāmānuja he jagattrayaguro he puṇḍarīkākṣa māṃ he gopījananātha pālaya paraṃ jānāmi na tvāṃ vinā // KMukm_21 //
analyzed: he rāmānuja he jagattraya guro he puṇḍarīkākṣa mām he gopījananātha pālaya param jānāmi na tvām vinā

original: bhaktāpāyabhujāṅgagāruḍamaṇis trailokyarakṣāmaṇir gopīlocanacātakāmbudamaṇiḥ saundaryamudrāmaṇiḥ /
yaḥ kāntāmaṇirukmiṇīghanakucadvandvaikabhūṣāmaṇiḥ śreyo devaśikhāmaṇir diśatu no gopālacūḍāmaṇiḥ // KMukm_22 //
analyzed: yaḥ kāntā maṇi rukmiṇī ghana kuca dvandva eka bhūṣā maṇiḥ śreyaḥ deva śikhāmaṇiḥ diśatu naḥ gopāla cūḍāmaṇiḥ

original: śatrucchedaikamantraṃ sakalam upaniṣadvākyasampūjyamantraṃ saṃsārottāramantraṃ samupacitatamasaḥ saṅghaniryāṇamantram /
analyzed: śatru cheda eka mantram sakalam upaniṣad vākya sampūjya mantram saṃsāra uttāra mantram samupacita tamasaḥ saṅgha niryāṇa mantram

original: sarvaiśvaryaikamantraṃ vyasanabhujagasandaṣṭasantrāṇamantraṃ jihve śrīkṛṣṇamantraṃ japa japa satataṃ janmasāphalyamantram // KMukm_23 //
analyzed: sarva aiśvarya eka mantram vyasana bhujaga sandaṣṭa santrāṇa mantram jihve śrī kṛṣṇa mantram japa japa satatam janma sāphalya mantram

original: vyāmohapraśamauṣadhaṃ munimanovṛttipravṛttyauṣadhaṃ daityendrārtikarauṣadhaṃ tribhuvane sañjīvanaikauṣadham /
analyzed: vyāmoha praśama auṣadham muni manaḥ vṛtti pravṛtti auṣadham daitya indra ārti kara auṣadham tribhuvane sañjīvana eka auṣadham

original: bhaktātyantahitauṣadhaṃ bhavabhayapradhvaṃsanaikauṣadhaṃ śreyaḥprāptikarauṣadhaṃ piba manaḥ śrīkṛṣṇadivyauṣadham // KMukm_24 //
analyzed: bhakta atyanta hita auṣadham bhava bhaya pradhvaṃsana eka auṣadham śreyaḥ prāpti kara auṣadham piba manaḥ śrī kṛṣṇa divyauṣadham

original: āmnāyābhyasanāny araṇyaruditaṃ vedavratāny anvahaṃ medaśchedaphalāni pūrtavidhayaḥ sarve hutaṃ bhasmani /
analyzed: āmnāya abhyasanāni araṇya ruditam veda vratāni anvaham medaḥ cheda phalāni pūrta vidhayaḥ sarve hutam bhasmani

original: tīrthānām avagāhanāni ca gajasnānaṃ vinā yatpada-dvandvāmbhoruhasaṃsmṛtīr vijayate devaḥ sa nārāyaṇaḥ // KMukm_25 //
analyzed: tīrthānām avagāhanāni ca gajasnānam vinā yat pada dvandva ambhoruha saṃsmṛtīḥ vijayate devaḥ sa nārāyaṇaḥ

original: śrīmannāma procya nārāyaṇākhyaṃ ke na prāpur vāñchitaṃ pāpino 'pi /
analyzed: śrīmat nāma procya nārāyaṇa ākhyam ke na prāpuḥ vāñchitam pāpinaḥ

original: hā naḥ pūrvaṃ vāk pravṛttā na tasmiṃs tena prāptaṃ garbhavāsādiduḥkham // KMukm_26 //
analyzed: hā naḥ pūrvam vāc pravṛttā na tasmin tena prāptam garbha vāsa ādi duḥkham

original: majjanmanaḥ phalam idaṃ madhukaiṭabhāre matprārthanīyamadanugraha eṣa eva /
analyzed: mad janmanaḥ phalam idam madhu kaiṭabhāre mad prārthanīya mad anugrahaḥ eṣaḥ eva

original: tvadbhṛtyabhṛtyaparicārakabhṛtyabhṛtya-bhṛtyasya bhṛtya iti māṃ smara lokanātha // KMukm_27 //
analyzed: tvad bhṛtya bhṛtya paricāraka bhṛtya bhṛtya bhṛtyasya bhṛtyaḥ iti mām smara lokanātha

original: nāthe naḥ puruṣottame trijagatāṃ ekādhipe cetasā sevye svasya padasya dātari sure nārāyaṇe tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: nāthe naḥ puruṣottame tri jagatām eka adhipe cetasā sevye svasya padasya dātari sure nārāyaṇe tiṣṭhati

original: yaṃ kañcit puruṣādhamaṃ katipayagrāmeśam alpārthadaṃ sevāyai mṛgayāmahe naram aho mūkā varākā vayam // KMukm_28 //
analyzed: yam kañcid puruṣa adhamam katipaya grāma īśam alpa artha dam sevāyai mṛgayāmahe naram aho mūkāḥ varākāḥ vayam

original: madana parihara sthitiṃ madīye manasi mukundapadāravindadhāmni /
analyzed: madana parihara sthitim madīye manasi mukunda pada aravinda dhāmni

original: haranayanakṛśānunā kṛśo 'si smarasi na cakraparākramaṃ murāreḥ // KMukm_29 //
analyzed: hara nayana kṛśānunā kṛśaḥ si smarasi na cakra parākramam murāreḥ

original: tattvaṃ bruvāṇāni paraṃ parastān madhu kṣarantīva satāṃ phalāni /
analyzed: tattvam bruvāṇāni param parastāt madhu kṣaranti iva satām phalāni

original: prāvartaya prāñjalir asmi jihve nāmāni nārāyaṇagocarāṇi // KMukm_30 //
analyzed: prāvartaya prāñjaliḥ asmi jihve nāmāni nārāyaṇa gocarāṇi

original: idaṃ śarīraṃ pariṇāmapeśalaṃ pataty avaśyaṃ ślathasandhijarjaram /
analyzed: idam śarīram pariṇāma peśalam patati avaśyam ślatha sandhi jarjaram

original: kim auṣadhaiḥ kliśyasi mūḍha durmate nirāmayaṃ kṛṣṇarasāyanaṃ piba // KMukm_31 //
analyzed: kim auṣadhaiḥ kliśyasi mūḍha durmate nirāmayam kṛṣṇa rasāyanam piba

original: dārā vārākaravarasutā te tanūjo viriñcaḥ stotā vedas tava suragaṇo bhṛtyavargaḥ prasādaḥ /
analyzed: dārāḥ vāra ākara vara sutā te tanūjaḥ viriñcaḥ stotā vedaḥ tava sura gaṇaḥ bhṛtya vargaḥ prasādaḥ

original: muktir māyā jagad avikalaṃ tāvakī devakī te mātā mitraṃ balaripusutas tvayy ato 'nyan na jāne // KMukm_32 //
analyzed: muktiḥ māyā jagat avikalam tāvakī devakī te mātā mitram bala ripu sutaḥ tvayi atas na jāne

original: kṛṣṇo rakṣatu no jagattrayaguruḥ kṛṣṇaṃ namasyāmy ahaṃ kṛṣṇenāmaraśatravo vinihatāḥ kṛṣṇāya tasmai namaḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ rakṣatu naḥ jagattraya guruḥ kṛṣṇam namasyāmi aham kṛṣṇena amara śatravaḥ vinihatāḥ kṛṣṇāya tasmai namaḥ

original: kṛṣṇād eva samutthitaṃ jagad idaṃ kṛṣṇasya dāso 'smy ahaṃ kṛṣṇe tiṣṭhati sarvam etad akhilaṃ he kṛṣṇa saṃrakṣa mām // KMukm_33 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇāt eva samutthitam jagat idam kṛṣṇasya dāsaḥ smi aham kṛṣṇe tiṣṭhati sarvam etat akhilam he kṛṣṇa saṃrakṣa mām

original: sa tvaṃ prasīda bhagavan kuru mayy anāthe viṣṇo kṛpāṃ paramakāruṇikaḥ kila tvam /
analyzed: sa tvam prasīda bhagavan kuru mayi anāthe viṣṇo kṛpām parama kāruṇikaḥ kila tvam

original: saṃsārasāgaranimagnam ananta dīnam uddhartum arhasi hare puruṣottamo 'si // KMukm_34 //
analyzed: saṃsāra sāgara nimagnam ananta dīnam uddhartum arhasi hare

original: namāmi nārāyaṇapādapaṅkajaṃ karomi nārāyaṇapūjanaṃ sadā /
analyzed: namāmi nārāyaṇa pāda paṅkajam karomi nārāyaṇa pūjanam sadā

original: vadāmi nārāyaṇanāma nirmalaṃ smarāmi nārāyaṇatattvam avyayam // KMukm_35 //
analyzed: vadāmi nārāyaṇa nāma nirmalam smarāmi nārāyaṇa tattvam avyayam

original: śrīnātha nārāyaṇa vāsudeva śrīkṛṣṇa bhaktapriya cakrapāṇe /
analyzed: śrī nātha nārāyaṇa vāsudeva śrī kṛṣṇa bhakta priya cakrapāṇe

original: śrīpadmanābhācyuta kaiṭabhāre śrīrāma padmākṣa hare murāre // KMukm_36 //
analyzed: śrī padmanābha acyuta kaiṭabhāre śrī rāma padmākṣa hare murāre

original: ananta vaikuṇṭha mukunda kṛṣṇa govinda dāmodara mādhaveti /
analyzed: ananta vaikuṇṭha mukunda kṛṣṇa govinda dāmodara mādhava iti

original: vaktuṃ samartho 'pi na vakti kaścid aho janānāṃ vyasanābhimukhyam // KMukm_37 //
analyzed: vaktum na vakti kaścid aho janānām vyasana ābhimukhyam

original: dhyāyanti ye viṣṇum anantam avyayaṃ hṛtpadmamadhye satataṃ vyavasthitam /
analyzed: dhyāyanti ye viṣṇum anantam avyayam hṛd padma madhye satatam vyavasthitam

original: samāhitānāṃ satatābhaya-pradaṃ te yānti siddhiṃ paramāṃ tu vaiṣṇavīm // KMukm_38 //
analyzed: samāhitānām satata abhaya pradam te yānti siddhim paramām tu vaiṣṇavīm

original: kṣīrasāgarataraṅgaśīkarā-sāratārakitacārumūrtaye /
analyzed: kṣīrasāgara taraṅga śīkara āsāra tārakita cāru mūrtaye

original: bhogibhogaśayanīyaśāyine mādhavāya madhuvidviṣe namaḥ // KMukm_39 //
analyzed: bhogi bhoga śayanīya śāyine mādhavāya madhuvidviṣe namaḥ

original: yasya priyau śrutidharau kavilokavīrau mitre dvijanmavarapadmaśarāv abhūtām /
analyzed: yasya priyau śruti dharau kavi loka vīrau mitre dvijanma vara padma śarau abhūtām

original: tenāmbujākṣacaraṇāmbujaṣaṭpadena rājñā kṛtā kṛtir iyaṃ kulaśekhareṇa // KMukm_40 //
analyzed: tena ambuja akṣa caraṇa ambuja ṣaṭpadena rājñā kṛtā kṛtiḥ iyam kulaśekhareṇa
